events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer’s message mentioning return and refund.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in refund processing and customer returns.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund and return process today.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return so I can initiate the refund for you?
The order number is 987654321. The jacket is too small and doesn’t fit my size, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. I’ve processed the return request and started your refund. You should see the money back in your account within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help! I appreciate how fast you handled the refund.
The refund case is now closed from our side. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out anytime.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything was handled to your satisfaction.
Since the refund was successfully received and no further issues are reported, this case will now be closed.
